channel.title: CVE Feed for A.K.I Software -- pmmls.exe

item.title: CVE-2023-40160|2024-03-18T00:32:53.212Z -- a.k.i%20software -- pmmls.exe
item.description: Directory traversal vulnerability exists in Mailing List Search CGI (pmmls.exe) included in A.K.I Software's PMailServer/PMailServer2 products. If this vulnerability is exploited, a remote attacker may obtain arbitrary files on the server.
